casebody.data:
HCP EMOH, L.L.C.
v.
WASHINGTON CTY. BD. OF REVISION 2016-1712 Supreme Court of Ohio. December 26, 2018

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

RECONSIDERATION OF PRIOR DECISIONS

On motion for reconsideration. Motion denied. French, DeWine, and DeGenaro, JJ., dissent. Susan D. Brown, of the Tenth District Court of Appeals, sitting for Fischer, J.
